borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="">On account of its siting&nbsp;within a rear garden setting, the proposed development is at odds with the surrounding pattern of development and results in harm to neighbouring occupiers through the&nbsp;additional generation of noise, waste, smoke, fumes and comings and goings.&nbsp;The development would therefore constitute&nbsp;unneighbourly&nbsp;development and is contrary to: <br></p><ul><li style="">Paragraph 130 of the National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, September 2023); <br></li><li style="">Policies D1 and D6 of the London Plan (March 2021);&nbsp; <br></li><li style="">Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);&nbsp; <br></li><li style="">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);&nbsp; <br></li><li style="">Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021); <br></li><li style="">The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</li></ul>

<p>The principle of introducing a self-contained outbuilding of&nbsp;primary residential use within the garden setting of no.28 Western Avenue is not supported. The proposal&nbsp;represents an&nbsp;inappropriate and uncharacteristic residential form in a rear garden setting. As such, the proposal is contrary to:&nbsp;&nbsp;As such, the proposal is contrary to: </p><ul><li>Paragraph 130 of the National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;(DLUHC, September 2023);</li><li>Policies D1, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (March 2021);&nbsp;</li><li>Policy CP3 of the&nbsp;Local Development Framework Core Strategy (July 2010); </li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);</li><li> Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan&nbsp;(Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021); </li><li>The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</li></ul>
description: Construction of an annexe to rear garden to provide habitable accommodation.
